==== index.js (6 errors) ====

    export const obj1 = {
      /**
       * my awesome getter (first in source order)
       * @returns {string}
                   ~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
       */
      get x() {
        return "";
      },
      /** 
       * my awesome setter (second in source order)
       * @param {string} a
                 ~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
       */
      set x(a) {},
    };
